source_objects.title: Entrepreneurship
source_objects.description: Achieve your entrepreneurship dreams with courses on: lean start-up, developing a business plan, and launching your venture.

items.title: Starting a Small Business - Startup Guide for Entrepreneurs
items.headline: Learn the Steps Necessary to Get Your Small Business Started in the Correct Manner for the United States
objectives_summary: The steps necessary to start a business in the United States.
All the funding options available for funding your business.
The various legal forms of doing business in the United States.

items.title: Real Fast Podcast into Best Selling Kindle Books Easily
items.headline: Hate writing? Love Podcasting? This is the fastest and easiest process for publishing your Kindle book real fast!
objectives_summary: Use their Podcast to produce Kindle and Print-on-Demand books fast!
Position yourself as an expert in your field

items.title: How To Create A Learning Management System With Wordpress
items.headline: Learn how to create a learning management system website with wordpress today
objectives_summary: At the end of your course, you will learn how to install wordpress and also create a Learning Management System (LMS) with wordpress.
You will also get introduced to generic pricing models , concept of flipped classrooms and gamification ideas briefly in this course.

items.title: How to Work from Home Flipping Furniture
items.headline: Complete guide from start to finish. See how you can work from home painting furniture. Buying, refinishing, & selling.
objectives_summary: Work from home.
Refinish discarded furniture into works of art.
Bring in extra income working for yourself at a pace you want.

items.title: Build a Popular & Powerful Business or Personal Brand Online
items.headline: Start a business or personal brand online, establish your authority, and become a star blogger.
objectives_summary: Build a comprehensive online brand that makes real revenue.
Build a personal brand based on your ambitions and goals.
Get more followers, look better, and post better content on social media.

items.title: Truck Driver Recruiter - How To Become A Rolling Recruiter
items.headline: How To Maximize Your Income  Faster While Helping Other Drivers Do The Same...
objectives_summary: How to systematically and efficiently recruit other truck drivers.
The almost Secret Opportunities that are hiding in plain sight - and how to systematically profit from them all!
Marketing and sales tactics that work to build your prospect list.

items.headline: 7 Strategies to Start Your Profitable Online Side Hustles
objectives_summary: Uncover some of the most profitable side hustles that you can get started with even if you work a full-time job!
Learn all about the 6-figure side hustle in chapter 2! This is one of the most powerful income opportunities of them all and can be done several different ways.
Find out how you can spend less than one hour a day on this one side hustle that could earn thousands a month in just a short time!

objectives_summary: Understand various types of home
Learn about different loan options
Search and find various down payment options to buy a dream home

items.title: Entrepreneurship For Kids - Business Ideas, Skills and Tips
items.headline: Learn some of the best business ideas for kids, successfully starting them, or how to turn your own idea into a business
objectives_summary: Learn From A Top Rated Instructor Who Has Been Teaching On Udemy Since 2013 and Taught Over 100,000 Students!
Feasibility
Evaluate Ideas

items.title: How to Grow Your Etsy Shop: 4 Businesses you can Start Now
items.headline: These are the same 4 ETSY businesses that I use in my ETSY store. Let me show you what I do. I don't hold anything back.
objectives_summary: Work from home and get out of the Rat Race!
Take 4 Profitable ETSY Business Models and begin creating listings almost immediately
Download a MASSIVE collection of Public Domain Images for immediate resale use

items.title: Masterclass: Start Your Food Business 7 courses in 1
items.headline: This course covers everything you need to know on how to put up and manage your own food business.
objectives_summary: Learn where to find your initial capital and how to prepare an effective business pitch to investors.
Learn the resources needed to start the business from facilities and equipment, manpower, and everything in between.
Perform a methodical market analysis and competitor analysis to understand consumers and the industry with more depth.

visible_instructors.job_title: Salesforce Certified Application Architect, Developer, Admin

items.headline: Just got yourself a Reseller Account, or maybe a VPS and not sure where to start? This course is built exactly for you!
objectives_summary: Have a fully working web hosting business ready to accept orders and sign ups!

items.title: Fundraising Bootcamp: Raise Angel and Venture Capital faster
items.headline: You can raise Angel and Venture Capital faster with this intensive workshop. Entrepreneur-friendly!
objectives_summary: Learn the art and science behind fundraising
Gain a set of tools to be able to dynamically present yourself and your business
Learn the terms, thought process and motivations behind common VC decisions

items.title: Side Hustle -  44 Ways To Make Money Online
items.headline: Learn 44 unique methods on how to generate a income from the comfort of your home.
objectives_summary: 44 side hustles to supplement your income
How to create side income
Multiple Sources of Income

items.headline: How to make passive income online with no upfront cost

Discover the fastest way to get up and running in just a matter of days - even if you're a complete beginner!
Find out how you can create a passive income empire that will send automatic checks to your bank account!
